documentType: Bureau of Prisons inmate financial/contact report
summary: This document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW report for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg # 76318-054), covering the period from May 21, 2019, to August 19, 2019. It details three Western Union money transfers received by Epstein while in custody and lists two outside contacts, Gulnora Tali and Richard Kahn.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was receiving money via Western Union while in federal custody in 2019, with three transfers totaling $700 between July 8 and August 7.
The Bureau of Prisons maintained a list of outside contacts for Epstein, including Gulnora Tali (zip 11223) and Richard Kahn (zip 10021).

This report was generated on August 19, 2019, which was just over two weeks after Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019, suggesting it was part of post-mortem record-keeping or an ongoing review.
The document confirms Epstein's federal inmate registration number was 76318-054.
The report period (May 21, 2019 to August 19, 2019) covers the final months of Epstein's life while he was in custody awaiting trial.
